title: Global Friendship Vol 4 P - T: Global Friendship Vol 4 Pakistan - Trinidad
description: Amara Para Global Friendship Vol 4 P - T is another exciting, educational book from the popular and fun Amara Para series which teaches children from ages 4 - 7 about diversity, global culture and the world. This book along with the others in the collection is an excellent resource for parents, nursery school teachers, primary school teachers and educators to read with children or to children while using the information in the book to teach children about different aspects of different cultures from flags to languages. Come and meet Amara Para's friends from around the world. Learn about the wonderful world of global culture as we take you on a journey through Pakistan, Qatar, Russia, Singapore and Trinidad in this colourful and educational book. Celebrate diversity as you learn about Amara Para's many friends, their countries, cultures, languages and the things they love. This is one of a collection of six books which teaches children and parents about diversity and global culture. Come and learn with us about the world.`Loved this book. My son and I have learned so much from this book and the others in the collection.`'I wanted to teach my five year old daughter about her Trinidadian heritage and I have found a fun an interesting way to do it with this book. Very informative but easy for children to learn from'.'It's great to see a children's book with Pakistan and Pakistani characters shown in such a positive light in the current climate. I love the sections about the different countries my children have falling in love with the books'.
author: H. Aitoro
